GSD.product_version: versions from v4.17 to before v5.16.19
GSD.description:
crypto: ccree - Fix use after free in cc_cipher_exit()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit 25c358efee5153dfd240d4e0d3169d5bebe9cacd, it was introduced in version v4.17 by commit 63ee04c8b491ee148489347e7da9fbfd982ca2bb. For more details please see the references link.
